name: That's Just Business
description:
Even amidst the apocalypse, business is business.

In this 2D strategy game, you must supply the survivors of the town you operate in with the supplies they need to not only live, but repel the threat of Husks, or sun-risen zombies. Keeping the community alive and protected, day and night, not only means a profit, but means your store can stay standing. 

A game of balance.
